com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.sensors

Interface SscConnectionStatusListener


  • public interface SscConnectionStatusListener
    Used for receiving Snapdragon Sensor Core connection status events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnectionLost()
      Called when connection to the sensors core is lost.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnectionLost

        void onConnectionLost()
        Called when connection to the sensors core is lost. This could mean:
        • Problem communicating with the sensor core
        • Sensor core is not supported on the device
